name.es: Adblock Bear - Bloquea los anuncios intrusivos
name.fil: Adblock Bear - I-block ang mga mapanghimasok na ads
name.fr: Adblock Bear - Bloque les pubs intrusives
name.id: Adblock Bear - Blokir iklan yang mengganggu
name.it: Adblock Bear - Blocca gli annunci invadenti
name.ms: Adblock Bear - Sekat iklan yang mengganggu
name.pt_BR: Adblock Bear - Bloqueie os anúncios invasivos
name.th: Adblock Bear - บล็อกโฆษณารบกวน
name.tr: Adblock Bear - Rahatsız edici reklamları engelleyin
name.vi: Adblock Bear - Chặn quảng cáo xâm phạm

short.ar: أوقف الإعلانات المزعجة، إعلانات وسائل التواصل الاجتماعي والنوافذ المنبثقة على بعض المواقع الأكثر شهرة
short.am,bg,bn,ca,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_4: Stop annoying ads, social ads and popups on some of the most popular sites.
short.cs: Zastavte invazivní reklamy, sociální reklamy a vyskakovací okna na některých z nejpopulárnějších webů.
short.da: Stop påtrængende reklamer, sociale medier-reklamer og pop-ups på nogle af de mest populære hjemmesider.
short.de: Stoppe aufdringliche Werbung, Social-Media-Werbung und Pop-ups auf einigen der beliebtesten Webseiten.
short.es: Detén los anuncios invasivos, los anuncios en redes sociales y los pop-ups en algunos de los sitios más populares.
short.fi: Lopeta tunkeilevat mainokset, sosiaalisen median mainokset ja ponnahdusikkunat joillakin suosituimmilla sivustoilla.
short.fil: Itigil ang mga mapanghimasok na ads, mga ad sa social media, at mga pop-up sa ilan sa mga pinakasikat na site.
short.fr: Arrêtez les publicités invasives, les publicités sur les réseaux sociaux et les pop-ups sur certains des sites les plus populaires
short.id: Hentikan iklan yang mengganggu, iklan di media sosial, dan pop-up di beberapa situs paling populer.
short.it: Ferma gli annunci invadenti, gli annunci sui social media e i pop-up su alcuni dei siti più popolari.
short.ms: Hentikan iklan yang mengganggu, iklan sosial dan pop-up di beberapa laman paling popular.
short.nl: Stop opdringerige advertenties, sociale advertenties en pop-ups op enkele van de meest populaire sites.
short.no: Stopp påtrengende annonser, sosiale medieannonser og pop-ups på noen av de mest populære nettstedene.
short.pt_BR: Pare os anúncios invasivos, anúncios sociais e pop-ups em alguns dos sites mais populares.
short.ro: Oprește reclamele invazive, reclamele sociale și pop-up-urile pe unele dintre cele mai populare site-uri.
short.sv: Stoppa påträngande annonser, sociala medieannonser och pop-ups på några av de mest populära webbplatserna.
short.th: หยุดโฆษณาที่รบกวน โฆษณาบนโซเชียล และป๊อปอัปในบางเว็บไซต์ที่ได้รับความนิยมมากที่สุด
short.tr: En popüler sitelerden bazılarında rahatsız edici reklamları, sosyal medya reklamlarını ve açılır pencereleri durdurun.
short.vi: Ngăn chặn quảng cáo xâm phạm, quảng cáo mạng xã hội và cửa sổ bật lên trên một số trang web phổ biến nhất.

long.ar,cs,da,de,es,fi,fil,id,it,ms,nl,no,pt_:
Blocking trackers, ads and protecting your privacy.
Privacy Bear is the easiest way to protect your privacy without complicated settings.

✅Blocks Ads from thousands of sources, but does not block all ads to avoid being detected as an ad blocker.
✅ Emails - blocking email trackers, ensuring that your emails are not used to drive commercial offers.
✅ Social & Analytics Privacy - We block the analytics and major social trackers.
✅ Easy & light - Nothing to configure, easy to use and our code is as light as possible to not consume your precious memory.

 🛃 Why does Privacy Bear need to read and change all my data on the websites I visit❓
When you install Privacy Bear, your browser warns that Privacy Bear can “read and change all your data on the websites you visit”.

Privacy Bear requires these permissions to do its job of blocking trackers on all websites you visit. For more information, see our Privacy Bear Privacy Policy : https://privacy-bear.net/policy.html

⭐ About
We are a non profit organization dedicated to protect the privacy of every user of the web and emails.
long.am,bg,bn,ca,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_4:
Blocking social and ads trackers.
Ad Block Bear is the easiest way to protect your privacy without complicated settings.

✅Blocks Ads from thousands of sources, but does not block all ads to avoid being detected as an ad blocker.
✅ Emails - blocking email trackers, ensuring that your emails are not used to drive commercial offers.
✅ Social & Analytics Privacy - We block the analytics and major social trackers.
✅ Easy & light - Nothing to configure, easy to use and our code is as light as possible to not consume your precious memory.

 🛃 Why does Privacy Bear need to read and change all my data on the websites I visit❓
When you install Privacy Bear, your browser warns that Privacy Bear can “read and change all your data on the websites you visit”.

Privacy Bear requires these permissions to do its job of blocking trackers on all websites you visit. For more information, see our Privacy Bear Privacy Policy : https://privacy-bear.net/policy.html

⭐ About
We are a non profit dedicated to protect the privacy of every user of the web and emails by blocking a lot of commercial trackers.
long.fr:
Bloquer les trackers, les publicités et protéger votre vie privée.
Privacy Bear est le moyen le plus simple de protéger votre vie privée sans paramètres compliqués.

✅Bloque les publicités provenant de milliers de sources, mais ne bloque pas toutes les publicités pour éviter d'être détecté comme bloqueur de publicités.
✅ E-mails - bloque les trackers d'e-mails, garantissant que vos e-mails ne sont pas utilisés pour générer des offres commerciales.
✅ Confidentialité sociale et analytique - Nous bloquons les analyses et les principaux trackers sociaux.
✅ Facile et léger - Rien à configurer, facile à utiliser et notre code est aussi léger que possible pour ne pas consommer votre précieuse mémoire.

  🛃 Pourquoi Privacy Bear a-t-il besoin de lire et de modifier toutes mes données sur les sites Web que je visite❓
Lorsque vous installez Privacy Bear, votre navigateur vous avertit que Privacy Bear peut « lire et modifier toutes vos données sur les sites Web que vous visitez ».

Privacy Bear a besoin de ces autorisations pour faire son travail de blocage des trackers sur tous les sites Web que vous visitez. Pour plus d'informations, consultez notre politique de confidentialité Privacy Bear : https://privacy-bear.net/policy.html

⭐ À propos
Nous sommes une organisation à but non lucratif dédiée à protéger la vie privée de chaque utilisateur du Web et des e-mails.
